name: smokeping
description: SmokePing is a latency monitoring tool for network links. It runs scheduled pings and visualizes performance and packet loss in RRD graphs via a web interface.

features.title: Latency Monitoring
features.description: Measures network latency with continuous ping tests

features.title: Packet Loss Tracking
features.description: Detects and visualizes packet loss over time

features.title: Rrd Graphs
features.description: Displays historical latency data in detailed time-series graphs

features.title: Multiple Targets
features.description: Monitors multiple hosts or network endpoints simultaneously

features.title: Smoke Visualization
features.description: Shows latency distribution with unique smoke-like graph rendering

features.title: Alert Thresholds
features.description: Configures alerts when latency exceeds defined thresholds

features.title: Dns Monitoring
features.description: Tests DNS resolution times alongside network latency

features.title: Multi
features.description: Monitors via ICMP, TCP, DNS, and other protocols
